metadata.title: CVE-2017-9991 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the xwd_decode_frame function inlibavcodec/xwddec.c in FFmpeg before 2.8.12, 3.0.x before 3.0.8, 3.1.xbefore 3.1.8, 3.2.x before 3.2.5, and 3.3.x before 3.3.1 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
